title: 220 25 "Was It Lost? Stolen? Who Are You?"Transliteration: "Ushinatta? Ubawareta? Omae wa Dare da?" (Japanese:失った?奪われた?おまえはだれだ?) Munehisa Sakai Junki Takegami February 6, 2005(2005-02-06)[20] August 18, 2013
transformers_text: 220 25 Was It Lost Stolen Who Are You Transliteration Ush in atta Ub aware ta O mae wa Dare da Japanese M une his a Sakai Junk i Take gam i February 6 2005 2005 02 06 20 August 18 2013 A mysterious figure appears during the night and steals the memories of the crew In the morning Robin is the only one who remembers the Straw Hats adventures together Her attempts to keep the crew together fail as Nami and Zoro go separate ways
